tool_description: Tracks and analyzes performance metrics across all distribution channels, providing real-time analytics on delivery rates, engagement, and response patterns.

campaign_ids.description: Array of campaign IDs to track

metrics_to_track.description: Specific metrics to include in tracking

real_time_updates.description: Whether to enable real-time metric updates

error_messages: Invalid campaign IDs: One or more campaign_ids are not found or not accessible for tracking.
Unknown metrics: metrics_to_track contains unsupported metric names. Use delivery_rate, open_rate, click_rate, response_rate, bounce_rate.
Invalid time window: Use one of [1h, 24h, 7d, 30d] for time_window parameter.
Tracking limit exceeded: Maximum 20 campaigns can be tracked simultaneously.
usage: Provide campaign_ids array to start tracking. Optionally specify metrics_to_track and time_window for customized analysis. Enable real_time_updates for live performance monitoring.

tracking_id.description: Unique identifier for the tracking session

overall_delivery_rate.description: Overall delivery success rate as percentage
